articles.title: Just beyond Ukraine's battlefields, NATO's elite forces prepare for what could come next - CBC.ca
articles.description: With Ukraine consumed by war, NATO's special operations forces know their skills could be called on if the conflict spreads, and of late, they've been very publicly showing off what they can do. CBC News spent several days this week in eastern Europe, coverin…
articles.content: In pitch blackness, the lights of the twin engine C-146A Wolfhound aircraft lit up a tiny strip of asphalt, and out of the darkness, the special forces plane touched down with a noisy, dramatic landi… [+7130 chars]
